title: Autofill is getting ridiculous
body:
When is it not on? Low population times my ass. I play Sunday midday to afternoon and thats a low pop time in fucking bronze.

Every day during weekday from 4:30 to 9:30

I dont want to fucking play support so I dont pick it.

Wasnt even a shorter queue I waited 30 minutes to get support like wtf? Why would I ever want that.

Forcing me into something and I'm gonna give **zero** fucks that game and 99% of the time lose because I dont want to play the game.

Not only that but dodging is a fucking pain and doesnt even fix the problem.

Instead of fixing your shithouse role you just shove it down everyones throats and expect us to sick your dick.

I played in S4 and S5 and I didnt mind playing support if I was last pick because there was no other option especially because it was a 1 in 5 chance. Now you give us the option to choose and then give us a feature that basically guarantees support and always fucking have it on. Dont show me the light then turn it off again, I never even complained about queue times other than the odd "Gee this is a bit long" after 30 mins with my friends

Problem is queue times havent changed for me but now I get support.
Maybe its better in Diamond+ or wherever but I can't be the only one with this crap

replies.body: go learn how to play support with bots--->normal---> then auto fill doesn't matter for rank games (Simple solution)
I've never once been auto filled to something I didn't pick. Not once. Ever.

yeah, but don't you just play 1 ( One ) sup game, I have only ever been forced into support role 1 game per day. So for me, its a "meh" situation. How often are you forced into the Support role on a daily basis?

learn to play support? i mean really man calm the hell down. I am a top/mid/jg main but i dont mind playing support. Morgana is a really fun support because you only have to build 2 actual support items and then you can go full ap. and its really ghee bc she actually does quite a bit of dmg with her ultimate not to mention the stun on it. ANother fun support is Kayle and Blitzcrank. Dw about it man just learn some fun supporty roles ;)
